actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 and the Social Security Act to clarify rules for determining whether certain agent-drivers and commission-drivers are employees.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code and the Social Security Act to revise rules applied in determining whether certain agent-drivers and commission-drivers are employees.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 and the Social Security Act to clarify rules for determining whether certain agent-drivers and commission-drivers are employees.
